column1: Following this, 600l of buffer AL from the Qiagen DNeasy Blood and Tissue minikit was added, and samples were processed in accordance with the kit manufacturers instructions for DNA purification of bacterial cells.

Endocervical samples were collected using Digene cervical samplers and stored in Digene transport medium at 80C until DNA extraction using the MagNA Pure Compact System and the MagNA Pure Compact Nucleic Acid Isolation kit ( Roche Molecular Diagnostics, Mannheim, Germany).
